text: You and Me, No Matter What
trans: 你和我的羁绊

text: Just as Vane and Lancelot defeat the monsters, the sky begins to thunder. They find a cave for shelter from the rain and start a fire. They talk about their friendship and their trust in each other during tough scrapes. But soon enough a monster appears from within the cave.
trans: 就在维恩和兰斯洛特打败魔物之后，天空中开始响起雷声。他们找到了一个避雨的山洞并生起了火。二人聊起了它们之间的友谊和在各种艰难环境下的信赖，但是很快山洞中就出现了一个魔物。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Pant... Pant... I think we got them.
trans: 咳……这应该是最后一个了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: This area must be monster territory.
trans: 看起来这里应该是魔物的领地呢。

text: As soon as the two knights defeat the monsters, the clouds above darken and thunder starts to roar. A storm threatens.
trans: 就在两位骑士打到了魔物的时候，云彩开始变暗，天空响起雷声，暴风雨即将来临。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Oh, come on! Can't two guys catch a break?
trans: 可恶！麻烦一个接着一个的！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane! We need to find shelter before the rain finds us!
trans: 维恩！必须在下雨前找到一个避雨的地方！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Ditto! Lean on me—I'll be your crutch.
trans: 好！兰酱，靠在我的肩膀上，我来支撑你！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Much obliged. Let's follow the river for now.
trans: 多谢，先沿着河找吧。

text: Lancelot limps along with Vane's help.
trans: 兰斯洛特在维恩的帮助下前行。

text: Before long they come across a cave large enough to accommodate them.
trans: 他们成功地在下雨前找到一个足以容纳他们两人的山洞。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Whew! We made it! And not a drop of rain on us!
trans: 咻，不管怎么说总算是没被雨浇到啊。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Not a moment too soon either.
trans: 呀咧呀咧，真是千钧一发呢。

name: Vane/维恩
text: It might be a little dark and damp in here, but it looks like we're finally safe.
trans: 虽然这里又黑又潮湿，但是看上去我们终于安全了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: The sun's setting as well. It might be best to spend the night here.
trans: 外面的天色也暗下来了，看来今天只能在这里过夜了。

name: Vane/维恩
text: You're right! Wouldn't want to wander down the mountain when it's pitch black out there.
trans: 没错，天黑的时候在山林里胡乱行走浪费体力就不好了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Perhaps we should use the rest of the kindling to make a fire while there's still light.
trans: 那么就趁着还有光，用剩下的干草生火吧。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Right! I'm on it!
trans: 哦！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Haha.
trans: 哈哈。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Hm? What's so funny?
trans: 嗯？我做了什么好笑的事情吗？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Oh, nothing. I was just thinking about how dependable you've been today.
trans: 不是，我是在想，今天的维恩真是可靠啊。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Really? Aren't I always like this?
trans: 真的吗？我一直以来都是这个样子的吧。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Wait. Does that mean I'm usually not dependable?
trans: 不是，平时的我是有多不靠谱啊？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: No, no! That's not what I meant at all!
trans: 不是不是，我不是那个意思。

name: Vane/维恩
text:
I guess...
I just really wanted this hike to go well, y'know?
trans: 哈哈，不过嘛，今天的登山真是成功啊。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Mm. As did I.
trans: 嗯，我也是这么觉得的。

name: Vane/维恩
text: I'm... sorry things turned out like this.
trans: 结果变成这个样子，真是抱歉啊……

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Why're you apologizing? This isn't anyone's fault.
trans: 为什么你要道歉啊？变成这个样子不是任何人的错。

name: Vane/维恩
text:
Well, you have a point. But, I dunno, I can't help but feel responsible somehow.
Oh! I got a flame!
trans: 嗯，你说的也对，但是不知道怎么回事我觉得我有责任……哦！火升起来了！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Great going, Vane!
trans: 干得好，维恩！

name: Vane/维恩
text: This baby's going to be a roaring fire in no time! Sit tight!
trans: 这个火还需要一点照顾才能烧起来，稍等一下哦。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Huff! Huff!
trans: 呼，呼！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Yes! Just in time before dark!
trans: 不错！总算是在天黑之前赶上啦。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Argh! I just realized I'm starving!
trans: 可恶，这个时候才感觉到肚子好饿啊！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Pff! Haha! Here, have this.
trans: 噗，哈哈，给，来吃这个吧。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Huh? You brought emergency rations?
trans: 诶？这是什么？应急口粮？

name: Vane/维恩
text: You're the man, Lancey! Thanks!
trans: 太好啦谢谢你兰酱！那么我就不客气……

name: Vane/维恩
text: W-wait, wait, wait. Do you have one for yourself?
trans: 等等，兰酱的那一份呢？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Don't worry about me. I'm not too hungry right now.
trans: 嗯？我那一份就不用担心了，反正我现在肚子也不饿。

name: Vane/维恩
text: No, you gotta eat! We'll split it!
trans: 不行不行，给你分一半。

text: Vane tears the dried snack in two.
trans: 维恩将干粮掰成两半。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Here! Take it!
trans: 拿好，兰酱的份。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Heh. Thank you, Vane.
trans: 谢谢你，维恩。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Haha. Hey, I should be thanking you here.
trans: 嘿嘿，这里是我要谢谢兰酱。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane... Do you remember?
trans: 维恩，你还记得吗？

name: Vane/维恩
text: Hm? Remember what?
trans: 嗯？记得什么？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: That time when we were kids and went to play in the woods. We got ourselves so lost.
trans: 小时候我们一起在森林里玩耍，结果迷路了的那件事。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Huh? Oh, that! Yeah, I was so scared.
trans: 嗯？啊，是有哦，那个时候我可害怕啦。

name: Vane/维恩
text: I was crying my eyes out like there was no tomorrow. Man, I was such a baby.
trans: 那个时候我哭的可厉害啦，想起来还挺丢人啊。

name: Vane/维恩
text: But you didn't cry. Not even once. You looked after me the whole way through.
trans: 但是兰酱一次都没有哭，全程一直在照顾着我。

name: Vane/维恩
text: I don't know what I would've done without you.
trans: 如果不是和兰酱一起出去的话真不知道该怎么办了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: No.
trans: 不是的。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Huh?
trans: 诶？

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: No, Vane. You've got it all wrong. The only reason I didn't cry was because I had you with me.
trans: 不是的，维恩，我之所以没有哭，是因为有你陪伴在我身边。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: It's not that I was strong because I wasn't scared. There was simply nothing to fear as long as we were together.
trans: 我知道只要有你在身边，不管多大的困难我们都能一起跨越。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane. It's I who would've been helpless without you.
trans: 维恩，那个时候无助的是我啊。

name: Vane/维恩
text: Lancey...
trans: 兰酱……

text: The two stare at each other. Lancelot is the first to break the silence.
trans: 两人互相对视着，兰斯洛特率先打破了沉默。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Hahaha. And if I recall, you were hungry that time as well. I split my food with you then, just like now.
trans: 哈哈哈，而且如果我记得没错的话，那个时候你肚子饿了，我就像现在这样把自己的食物给了你。

name: Vane/维恩
text: What, seriously? Looks like I haven't changed one bit!
trans: 诶真的吗？我这不是一点都没有成长吗！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Hahaha, you certainly haven't.
trans: 哈哈哈，你真是一点都没有变呢。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Even back then you insisted we split the food. You wouldn't budge until we did.
trans: 因为那个时候你也坚持把一半的食物分给我。

name: Vane/维恩
text: One day I want to be strong enough to protect you, Lancey!
trans: 怎么说呢，有一天我会强大到可以保护兰酱嘛！

text: Sounds of movement start to echo from deep within the cave.
trans: 洞穴深处响起移动的声音。

name: Vane/维恩
text:
...!
Lance! Something's coming!
trans: 兰酱！有什么东西过来了！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Yes, it seems we're not alone in here. I'll take care of—
trans: 嗯，看来我们并不是独自在这里，这里就由我……

name: Vane/维恩
text: Leave this to me!
trans: 交给我吧！

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Vane! You can't do this alone!
trans: 维恩！你一个人不行的！

name: Vane/维恩
text: I can't let you fight in the condition you're in!
trans: 兰酱才是，这种状况不能战斗的吧。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Wha! No, but I can still—
trans: 什！这种状况不是——

name: Vane/维恩
text: You think I can't tell, but I can. You've been hiding how bad your leg hurts. You can barely walk, but you've been putting on a brave face for me.
trans: 其实你的腿一直很疼都走不了路了吧，但是一直为了我而硬撑着，难道我会看不出来吗。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: Ngh! That's—
trans: 呃！那是——

name: Vane/维恩
text: Lancelot! I'm not that kid in the woods anymore.
trans: 兰斯洛特！我已经不再是那个时候森林里的孩子了。

name: Lancelot/兰斯洛特
text: But... Vane...
trans: 维恩，你……

name: Vane/维恩
text: This time... it's my turn to protect you!
trans: 所以这一次，轮到我来保护你！

name: Monster/魔物
text: Grraaar!
trans: 嘎啊啊啊啊啊！

name: Vane/维恩
text: Sorry we woke you up, little guy, but I'm gonna have to tuck you back into bed!
trans: 吵醒你真是对不起啊，虽然很抱歉，但是要请你再一次睡过去了！
